SYSTEM: FAIR_Semantics.pdf: Página 5
FAIR semantics
Making semantic artefacts FAIR
5
§ 17 preliminary recommendations (P-Rec) related to 
one or more of the FAIR principles.
§ 10 best practice recommendations (BP-Rec) to 
improve the global FAIRness of semantic artefacts. 
§ Stakeholders:
o Practitioners
o Repositories
o Semantic Web Community
Le Franc, Y. et al., 2020. D2.2 FAIR Semantics: First recommendations (Version 1.0), 
https://zenodo.org/record/3707985#.Xns1TW57n65
speaker: SYSTEM
